title: Haystack

properties.name: description
properties.value: Haystacks are piles of hay found throughout RuneScape, especially on farms. If an empty sack is used on a haystack (or hay bale), a player will get a hay sack, which can be used for a scarecrow. One hay bale can be found just north-east of Draynor.

Advanced data
Object ID300, 8714, 8716, 20809

Haystacks are piles of hay found throughout RuneScape, especially on farms. If an empty sack is used on a haystack (or hay bale), a player will get a hay sack, which can be used for a scarecrow. One hay bale can be found just north-east of Draynor.

Haystacks can be searched, often resulting in nothing. However, there is a 10% chance[1] that players will find a needle. When this occurs, the player will say "Wow! A needle! Now what are the chances of finding that?" However, there is a 2% chance that players will get pricked with the needle, causing them to lose one hitpoint.

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Needle11/10420

Locations[edit | edit source]

Haystacks and hay bales can be found in following locations:

  • North-east of Draynor Village, north of the potato field
  • South of Falador, in the chicken pen
  • Just east of the general store in Edgeville
  • North of East Ardougne, west of the sheep field
  • Just west of the windmill north of East Ardougne
  • Combat training room directly north of Varrock east bank
  • Lumbridge Farm - West of the Cows
  • Just west of the Fairy Ring in the Realm of the Fisher King
  • South-east area of the Ranging Guild

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is a reference to the idiom, "needle in a haystack."

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 25 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "10% [to receive a needle]. Also there's a 2% chance of getting pricked without succeeding in taking the needle."

'''Haystacks''' are piles of hay found throughout ''[[RuneScape]]'', especially on farms. If an [[empty sack]] is used on a haystack (or [[hay bale]]), a player will get a [[hay sack]], which can be used for a [[scarecrow]]. One hay bale can be found just north-east of [[Draynor]].

Haystacks can be searched, often resulting in nothing. However, there is a 10% chance{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1056603985342275585|date=25 October 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/0V0Aw|archivedate=29 May 2020|quote=10% [to receive a needle]. Also there's a 2% chance of getting pricked without succeeding in taking the needle.}} that players will find a [[needle]]. When this occurs, the player will say "''Wow! A needle! Now what are the chances of finding that?''" However, there is a 2% chance that players will get pricked with the needle, causing them to lose one [[hitpoint]].

{{DropsTableHead}}
{{DropsLineReward|name=Needle|quantity=1|rarity=1/10}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}

==Locations ==
Haystacks and [[hay bale]]s can be found in following locations:
*North-east of [[Draynor Village]], north of the [[potato]] field
*South of [[Falador]], in the chicken pen
*Just east of the [[general store]] in [[Edgeville]]
*North of [[East Ardougne]], west of the [[sheep]] field
*Just west of the [[windmill]] north of [[East Ardougne]]
*Combat training room directly north of [[Varrock]] east bank
*Lumbridge Farm - West of the Cows
*Just west of the [[Fairy Ring]] in the [[Realm of the Fisher King]]
*South-east area of the [[Ranging Guild]]

==Trivia==
*The examine text is a reference to the idiom, "needle in a haystack."
